algorithms.search

Class CommonSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.search.CommonSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStar, BFS

    public abstract class CommonSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searcher
    This class has common fields for searchers. a PriorityQueue and number of evaluated nodes. notice the need of a Comparator in ct'r- whether it's as an argument or not. that's how the priorities are managed.
    Author:
    Tomer Cabouly
